altername_name: A Prendre ou à Laisser: Le Jeu Officiel
Deal or No Deal: The Official Nintendo DS Game
name: Deal or No Deal
overview: The hit TV show is coming to your favorite video game system! The premise is simple: You have 26 briefcases in front of you. Each one contains a different amount of money. Open each case one by one, and try to find the briefcase with the biggest amount of money. Deal Or No Deal?
